Html:
I've downloaded this project multiple times and have yet to get a version that will properly extract from the .zip format.

An "Error Copying File or Folder" dialog appears with the message "The system cannot find the file specified." Of course, the copy dialog doesn't display exactly which file/folder this is occurring on, but the extract folder only contains the VS 2008 subfolder with a few C++ files in it.

Anyone else having this problem ?

Hello BobS

Could you please let me know the detailed steps to see the problem? From which link & button are you downloading the zip?

Thanks
Jialiang Ge
